country.query: SELECT ?city ?cityLabel ?country ?countryLabel ?image WHERE {    ?city wdt:P31 wd:Q515.    ?city wdt:P17 ?country.   OPTIONAL { ?city wdt:P18 ?image. } SERVICE wikibase:label {  bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE]".   } }ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT ?limit

question.en: Which country does this image belong to?

flag.query: SELECT ?country ?countryLabel ?image ?countryLabel_es ?countryLabel_en WHERE { ?country wdt:P31 wd:Q6256; wdt:P41 ?image; rdfs:label ?countryLabel_es; rdfs:label ?countryLabel_en. FILTER (lang(?countryLabel_es) = "es") FILTER (lang(?countryLabel_en) = "en") SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE]". } } ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT ?limit
